name: A White Knight's Quest
description:
YOUR E-GIRL HAS BEEN TAKEN
You play as White Knight and Chad Thunder-Cock has stolen your favorite twitch streamer, it is up to you and the power of military weaponry to save her.

Plow through Chad's Tower of Chads and Brads blasting away while your e-girl is held captive by the God himself.

Game features eight different weapons and an in-game timer to time your speed-runs. With only 5 levels this game can be brutal but short and action packed.
